title: [Feat]: Force teams to refresh automatically
body:
### Describe the feature

I would like for teams for linux to make sure all messages are available so that i don't have to do it manually. 

### Motivation

I have found previous messages that are missing in my chats that only appear after i click refresh.
I think it shouldn't happen, could it be automated?
I didn't have this issue with the regular app.
